doc:
Joshua John Miller https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joshua_John_Miller 0 Joshua John Miller (born December 26, 1974) is an American actor, screenwriter, author, and director. Miller co-writes with his life partner M.A. Fortin; the two wrote the screenplay for the 2015 horror comedy The Final Girls, and the USA Network drama series Queen of the South. Joshua_John_Miller ( born December_26_,_1974 ) is an_American_actor , screenwriter , author , and director . Miller co-writes with his_life_partner_M.A._Fortin ; the_two wrote the_screenplay for the_2015_horror_comedy The_Final_Girls , and the_USA_Network_drama_series_Queen of the_South .
